creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
description: Abstract depiction of a court room with angular, simplified objects; on R, a large, pale orange podium with standing (or seated) figure; on L, three long rows with several figures; front row is pale green, second and third row is pale orange; section of American flag on R border; background is pale brown
inscription: Signature, date, title, number, chop mark
signed:
LL: [Progressive Proof - State 4 of 5]
Lower center: [\"Court Order\"]
LR: [Tom Attridge 84]
title: Court Order
